channel.title: Internal or external error
channel.description: Once again... I'm here about the internal and external.. error.... When i click runserver it comes up with a box and closes so quickly. that i gotta print screen what it says in the box.in the box it says[code]'java' is not recoginzed as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.[/code] All i no that it is most probaly that the classpaths are incorrect.. rite.. this is what my clathpass and path exactly says in the input box so rite i click environment variables then theres 2 boxes 1 at the top and 1 at the bottom ... now i clik edit the very bottom edit and choose class path and says [code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code] I then cancel that and click on path and click edit at the bottom and it says [code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;[/code] if any of the paths are rong plz tell me... or anything please[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 18, 2008, 10:32:25 am[/size][hr]GIVIN ADMIN/Modship who ever helps##@@@

item.title: Internal or external error
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Once again… I’m here about the internal and external… error… When i click runserver it comes up with a box and closes so quickly. that i gotta print screen what it says in the box.in the box it says'java' is not recoginzed as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. All i no that it is most probaly that the classpaths are incorrect… rite… this is what my clathpass and path exactly says in the input box so rite i click environment variables then theres 2 boxes 1 at the top and 1 at the bottom … now i clik edit the very bottom edit and choose class path and says CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
I then cancel that and click on path and click edit at the bottom and it says

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin; if any of the paths are rong plz tell me… or anything please[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 18, 2008, 10:32:25 am[/size][hr]GIVIN ADMIN/Modship who ever helps##@@@
